text: Kiribati's House of Assembly has 44 members, each elected from 22 multi-member constituencies. ==List of constituencies== * Abaiang * Abemama * Aranuka * Arorae * Banaba * Beru * Betio * Butaritari * Kiritimati and Kanton * Kuria * Maiana * Makin * Marakei * Nikunau * Nonouti * North Tarawa * Onotoa * Rabi * South Tarawa * Tab North * Tab South * Tabuaeran * Tamana * Teraina ==References== Kiribati
title: Constituencies of Kiribati
